data.name: Casey's Condo
data.detailed_description:
Come meet & play with your favorite porn stars in Casey’s Condo!

Casey’s Condo is the first release in the erotic virtual playground from Camasutra Industries. Featuring top adult stars Casey Calvert, Honey Gold, and Donny Sins, this is your chance to get intimate with photorealistic sexy avatars and explore all your dirty little fantasies in a completely lifelike experience.

Features:

  • Stunningly realistic models to have a up close & personal experience with
  • Uncensored hardcore fucking
  • State of the art motion capture and animation by Camasutra Industries
  • Realistic physics and immersive VR interactions
  • Launching with one female and one male performer with many more in upcoming releases

Do you have what it takes to leave Casey satisfied?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Please be aware that this game contains adult themed content. Digital avatars of adult actors are available in this game for a personal, one on one, interactive experience which include sex acts should, the user want to engage.  Our game does not include non-consensual sex, dug or alcohol abuse, or depicts self harming. 
Just good old fashion dirty fun with porn stars in VR.
